text.string: Done. Restart this application to take effect by clicking "Yes".
Keybaord Test Blue: Key pressed; Green: Passed

Click a key button above or press down a key on your keyboard to check the detailed statistics. Using "Real-time" Mode to get instant heat map of keystrokes, while "Delayed" Mode can save CPU resources.
Press down keys on your keyboard to test whether they can work properly.
Switch to "Delayed" Mode when surfering key lag.
Are you sure to reset keystrokes this time?
You are about to reset the total keystrokes statistics. Are you sure to continue?
Please go to Menu Preference -> Settings to reset the total keystrokes statistics.

CPS stands for Click-Per-Second. You can choose the test period you want. All you need to do is to click as many times as possible fore time is up. Feel free to try as many times as you want. According to some statistics, the average CPS is 6.51. And the world record was said to be 14.1 according to Google. Select testing time click the white box below to start.
Click me to start, and click as fast as possible.
Time is up, click Reset button to test again.

Spacebar CPS Test standards for sapcebar Click-Per-Second test. You can select your test time, and hit your spacebar as fast as you can. Feel free to test as many times as you want. The average Spacebar CPS is said to be 6.11 according to Google. Make sure you've got your favorite keyboard when taking this test.
Click me when you're ready, and then press your spacebar to start the test.
Time is up, click me to test again.
Press spacebar to start, and press as fast as you can.

WPM standards for words-per-minute, the measurement of typing speed. The average WPM is 40 according to Google. This tool is also suitable for practicing typing speed. Don't concentrate only on the value of WPM, accuracy is somehow more important, especially for the beginners. The ideal value of accuracy is above 96%.
The format of your words list is wrong, please try again.

Please click Browse button to choose your words list file. The file should be a text file contains only one line of English words. Using pipe character (|) to separate words. For example, your words list contains three words, "one", "two", and "three". The content of the file should be "one|two|three".

NOTE: The testing words may not be the frequently used words in the exam, or even less likely to appear. It is very common if there are lots of words unfamiliar to you. Don't let these words affect your mood. This tool is intent for practicing and testing typing, not for preparing for exams. The author takes no responsibility for the accuracy.
Some of the words do not meet the requirements and they won't appear. The length of all the words should between 1 and 70, and all the characters should be English letters, punctuation, and digits.
Please select a type of the assignment.
Please press down hot key first.
Duplicated hot key, please choose another one.
Are you sure to delete this assignment?
Keystrokes won't be recorded after quitting, are you sure to continue?
Are you sure to reset total keystrokes statistics file?
Are you sure to reset the configuration?
Your keystrokes won't be recorded after Windows startup, unless you run KeyPlus manually. Are you sure to continue?

Fail to read configuration file, it may because of corruption. Please do not modify the configuration file unless you know what you are doing. Now, do you want to reset the configuration file? If so, settings will be reseted and program will run. Otherwise, program won't run until you correct the configuration file.

Fail to read statistics file, it may because of corruption. Please do not modify the statistics file unless you know what you are doing. Now, do you want to reset the statistics file? If so, keystrokes statistics will be reseted and program will run. Otherwise, program won't run until you correct the statistics file.

Fail to read key assignment file, it may because of corruption. Please do not modify the file unless you know what you are doing. Now, do you want to reset the the key assignment file? If so, key assignments will be lost and program will run. Otherwise, program won't run unless you correct the key assignment file.

Real-time Mode gives you the instantly up-to-date heat map, 
but it will consume a little bit more CPU resources when the 
window is visible compared with Delay Mode. Switch to 
Delay Mode if suffering key lag or system freezes.
When checked, keystrokes trace will be retained.
